description: Nikola Petrak, motivated by mounting unrest and his knowledge of Council corruption, decides to leak the 2022 Council selection simulation files, aiming to expose systemic manipulation at the highest level.

Encrypted fragments of Council selection simulations begin circulating among trusted activist circles, who are instructed to use the data strategically to undermine public trust in current Council members.

Protesters broadcast key simulation footage, revealing real Council member BCI scores and highlighting rigged selection outcomes from 2022. Public outcry swells as people realize system leaders manipulated their rise to power.
Mass demonstrations erupt at major institutions. Spontaneous citizen courts convene to try local officials, demanding transparency and open confessions from implicated administrators.
Panic within the Council intensifies as disillusioned administrators start leaking classified internal deliberations to public channels, fueling distrust and accelerating the governance crisis.
